name: Shell
description: Exec shell script for selected alias. Enable shell plugin into alias and create file named {ID}.sh (Linux) or {ID}.ps1 (Windows), replace "ID" by alias id. File must be stored into "pagermon/server/plugins/Shell/". Place your code in this file.

aliasConfig.name: enable
aliasConfig.label: Enable
aliasConfig.description: Enable shell script that match this alias. File must be named {ID}.sh (Linux) or {ID}.ps1 (Windows), replace "ID" by alias id. File must be stored into "pagermon/server/plugins/Shell/"

aliasConfig.name: overrideAlias
aliasConfig.label: Override Alias
aliasConfig.description: Override filename, use another alias id. (only number)
